Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.switch.bgp

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.host import Host


[docs]class BgpNeighborTest(TestBase):


[docs]    class GetVlanException(Exception):
        pass



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def hasBgpNeighbor(host, neighbor):
        """
        This method checks if the hostname has the bgp neighbor
        Returns True if has Neighbor, else false
        """
        hostname = host.hostname
        cmd = 'fboss --host %s bgp neighbors | grep %s' % (
            hostname, neighbor)
        out = host.localhost.run(cmd)
        return 'ESTABLISHED' in out



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def getVlanIp(host, vlanPort):
        """
        Grab the ip on the given vlanPort, if it isn't available
        then thrown an exception
        """
        hostname = host.hostname
        cmd = 'fboss --host %s arp table | grep %s' % (hostname, vlanPort)
        out = host.localhost.run(cmd)
        if len(out) == 0:
            raise BgpNeighborTest.GetVlanException(
                    'Could not get ip for %s on vlanPort %s' % (
                        hostname, vlanPort))

        return out.split(' ')[0]



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def hasFboss(host):
        """
        Returns true if the host contains fboss
        """
        try:
            host.run('which fboss')
            return True
        except:  # noqa: B001 T25377293 Grandfathered in
            return False



[docs]    def __init__(self, vlanPort):
        self.vlanPort = vlanPort
        super(BgpNeighborTest, self).__init__()



[docs]    def execute(self):
        for host in self.hosts:
            host = Host(host)
            self.validate_condition(self.hasFboss(host.localhost),
                    'Check if localhost has fboss')
            neighbor = self.getVlanIp(host, self.vlanPort)
            hasPeers = self.hasBgpNeighbor(host, neighbor)
            self.validate_condition(hasPeers,
                'Check that %s has the peer %s' % (host.hostname, neighbor))
